episode.title: Obviously Tier One
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Marco Arment returns to the show to talk about the new Apple TV remote control. (Also, the new M1 iMacs and iPad Pros.)
episode.showNotes:
Marco Arment returns to the show to talk about the new Apple TV remote control. (Also, the new M1 iMacs and iPad Pros.)
